definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: Bar code is one of the investigation and popular anti-counterfeiting techniques.
sentences.chinese: 条形码是国际上通行的防伪措施之一。

sentences.english: The app utilises the camera on a mobile phone, which scans the barcode.
sentences.chinese: 这个程序用到手机上的摄像头，用来扫描条形码。

sentences.english: Assigns unique barcodes for each container in the system.
sentences.chinese: 独特的条形码分配每个集装箱在系统中。

sentences.english: There are two-dimensional and three-dimensional barcode readers available.
sentences.chinese: 有一些二维和三维的条形码读取器。

sentences.english: These tags will replace the bar-coded dangle tags.
sentences.chinese: 这些标签将会替代条形码垂型标签。

sentences.english: The first product to have a bar code was Wrigleys gum。
sentences.chinese: 世界上最早有条形码标记的商品是箭牌香口胶。

sentences.english: The first product to have a barcode on it was a pack of Wrigley's gum.
sentences.chinese: 第一个印上条形码的产品是一包青箭口香糖。

sentences.english: Mytago tags are a new version of the common barcodes.
sentences.chinese: Mytago标签是一个新的普通条形码的版本。

sentences.english: The first product to have a bar code was Wrigleys gum.
sentences.chinese: 天下下最迟有条形码原忘的商品是箭牌香口胶。

sentences.english: With a bit of skill, the barcode can disappear entirely.
sentences.chinese: 通过使用一些技巧，整个条形码还可以消失。

sentences.english: The first barcode looked like a bull's-eye and was made up of many small circles.
sentences.chinese: 第一代的条形码由许多小圆圈组成，看起来状似靶心。

sentences.english: Until now, the only authentication for milk origin was a bar code on a container.
sentences.chinese: 直到现在，唯一的产地鉴定标准来自奶罐上的条形码。

sentences.english: Microsoft Tag is an advanced barcode technology.
sentences.chinese: 微软标签是一项高级的条形码技术。

sentences.english: The OLM uses a linear bar code tape for positioning.
sentences.chinese: OLM使用线性条形码磁带来定位。

sentences.english: Recognizing barcodes via image processing method is the inevitable developing direction in the fileds of barcodes.
sentences.chinese: 通过图像处理技术识读条形码是必然的发展方向。

definition: verification code/CAPTCHA, a type of challenge-response test (computing)
